subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Daniel Wachira, a 5-year-old who survived horrific circumstances as a baby in Nairobi, Kenya, has developed a particular fondness for Lakers star Kobe Bryant. He was able to meet his idol last week.
snippet: Daniel Wachira, a 5-year-old who survived horrific circumstances as a baby in Nairobi, Kenya, has developed a particular fondness for Lakers star Kobe Bryant. He was able to meet his idol last week.
